description: Episode of Series "Our Asian Neighbours: Thailand". In Northern Island is a monastery said to be two thousand years old. It is called "Wa Chedi Sao", which in Northern Thai means the Temple of Twenty Pagodas. This film is about the daily life of the monastery and the village which it serves.
